name: sbh
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w0)
-| wnf(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w0)
-| wnf(s1, w0)

|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w0)
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, w0))

comment: Substitution for a variable not free in a wff does not affect it. (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1993.)
